function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Reliance on 5g network for real-time data transmission and communication between the patrol robots and authorities.","category":"Technology","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Privacy and ethical concerns related to the use of surveillance and data collection by patrol robots.","category":"Privacy & Ethics","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of established guidelines for patient data confidentiality in 5g healthcare systems","category":"Privacy & Ethics","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of emerging technologies for covid-19 management","category":"Technology","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate understanding of covid-19 transmission mechanism and stages of spread","category":"Knowledge","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Global economic impact of covid-19","category":"Economy","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid global spread of covid-19","category":"Epidemiology","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emergence of novel infectious diseases","category":"Epidemiology","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Manipulation of infectious disease data","category":"Data Integrity","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delay in reporting infectious disease cases due to intermediary processes","category":"Process","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Passive reporting method leading to omission of reports","category":"Process","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of hacking attack on central server for infectious disease reporting system","category":"Technology","confidence":"High"},{"name":"False information regarding infectious diseases","category":"Misinformation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate response to infectious disease outbreaks","category":"Response","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Declaration of a pandemic by who","category":"Policy","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on wearable technology for disease detection may lead to neglect of traditional diagnostic methods and clinical assessment.","category":"Technology","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Validation studies for wearables have not been conducted, creating obstacles for healthcare workers regarding their clinical utility.","category":"Technology","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"False-positive results from wearables create risks and require greater effort for correct interpretation of the data.","category":"Technology","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Patients are concerned with the privacy and security of their data when using wearables, as breaching of digital network security can lead to data exposure.","category":"Privacy & Ethics","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of ehealth wearables for covid-19 data interpretation and monitoring.","category":"Technology","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Utilization of wearable devices in the healthcare system.","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of covid-19 through the handling and sharing of wearable devices","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Role of cloud, edge, and fog computing in telehealth monitoring systems may pose security and privacy risks for the sensitive health data transmitted and stored.","category":"Privacy & Ethics","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wearable devices used for maintaining social distancing and contact tracing may raise concerns about data privacy and surveillance.","category":"Privacy & Ethics","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of wearables to monitor covid-19 symptoms may lead to inaccurate readings or interpretations, resulting in misdiagnosis or inappropriate treatment.","category":"Technology","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High cost of systems makes them less affordable to the public, limiting access to healthcare technology.","category":"Access","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regulatory approvals and medical device clearance processes may delay the implementation of healthcare technology.","category":"Process","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure of healthcare systems due to resource mismanagement","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate access to healthcare facilities leading to increased travel for diagnosis and testing","category":"Access","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and education about the use of iot-based devices and mobile applications in the context of contagious diseases.","category":"Education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in implementing cost-effective sensing units for low-income patients.","category":"Access","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of validation for system used for early diagnosis of covid-19 in students","category":"Technology","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient focus on post-covid-19-infection effects on patients","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Negative impact on mental health due to the pandemic","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential barriers to wearables’ usage in healthcare due to prototype stages and user acceptance, security, ethics, and big data concerns.","category":"Technology","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of technological awareness among the elderly population","category":"Education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unknown and novel viruses with similar patterns and symptoms may emerge in the future, leading to the possibility of facing another pandemic.","category":"Epidemiology","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious respiratory illnesses pose a persistent threat to global well-being.","category":"Epidemiology","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possible transmission of SARS-CoV-2 across countries through air travel","category":"Epidemiology","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Health expenditure as a proxy for differences in countries’ commitment to population health","category":"Economy","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regulated air travel may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases such as covid-19","category":"Epidemiology","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited health expenditure may result in insufficient healthcare resources during a pandemic","category":"Economy","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global crises such as the covid-19 pandemic and economic depression increase susceptibility to contagious diseases","category":"Epidemiology","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Nation-wide quarantines and lockdowns lead to economic impacts and social readjustment","category":"Policy","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential second waves of covid-19 infection","category":"Epidemiology","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential recurring risk of pandemics exacerbated by climate change impacts","category":"Epidemiology","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through the interaction with home energy management systems in a pandemic.","category":"Technology","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through the use of hems technologies and the interaction with end-users","category":"Technology","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reluctance of residents to adopt hems due to associated costs","category":"Social","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Perceived lack of usefulness of technology","category":"Technology","confidence":"High"}]}
